channel.title: Making summoning?
channel.description: How do I make/add summoning to my server, I saw one server that had summoning on it, You know where the harp icon is? to the right of the player controls icon? The guy put the monsters to summon in there and it was based on your level and how long you played, now obviously cuz of my noobish skillz I couldn't do that even if I tried but I wanted to know if I could get help on doing this.

item.title: Making summoning?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

ya, farming really isn’t working out for me cuz the xp is auto set to -0 for some reason, can u help me add summoning to my server?

Read full topic

item.title: Making summoning?

item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

i have summoning in my server
its kinda easy but u have to replace it with farming.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2009, 07:30:52 pm[/size][hr]well i meen summoning uses the farming method is the way to add it
